headline: Better Warren Buffett Stock: Visa vs. American Express
summary: Warren Buffett watchers know that American Express (NYSE: AXP) is one the investing legend's favorite stocks.  It's been a part of the Berkshire Hathaway portfolio for 30 years, and today it's the second-largest position behind Apple, accounting for 15.2% of the total.  Berkshire Hathaway owns 21.5% of American Express' outstanding shares, signifying his confidence in the company.
